Class CheesesteakFundraiser

java.lang.Object
CheesesteakFundraiser
public class CheesesteakFundraiser
extends java.lang.Object
Manages data and operations related to a cheesesteak fundraiser event, including loading member sales data, calculating shared values, and generating aggregate and individual sales reports. This class encapsulates functionality for managing sales data, calculating totals, and generating reports for a cheesesteak fundraiser event.
